CommandDefinition.Name: setdefaultpersistencelayer
CommandDefinition.Description: Marks a persistencelayerinstance as default for one connection type.

Argument.Name: persistenceLayerInstanceID
Argument.Description: The ID of the existing persistence layer. If not set, 'persistenceLayerInstanceName' is required

Argument.Name: connectionType
Argument.Description: Valid values for the connection type are: DEFAULT, ALTERNATIVE, HISTORY

Argument.Name: persistenceLayerInstanceName
Argument.Description: The Name of the existing persistence layer. If not set, 'persistenceLayerInstanceID' is required
